abstract: Governor Christie's deliberations as he considers whether to run for president. Also, Governor Perry's campaign faces another challenge, this one on the thorny issue of race.
snippet: Governor Christie's deliberations as he considers whether to run for president. Also, Governor Perry's campaign faces another challenge, this one on the thorny issue of race.
lead_paragraph: A look at Gov. Chris Christie's options as he considers whether to run for president. Also, Gov. Rick Perry's campaign faces another challenge, this one on the thorny issue of race.

headline.main: Caucus Video: Chris Christie's Deliberations; Rick Perry and Race
